title: Kobuk Valley National Park: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia        Mountain peaks for miles NPS Photo/Eileen Devinney            A Picture's Worth a Thousand Words Not many people get the chance to see Kobuk Valley National Park in person, so we've taken the old adage to heart and created photo galleries of Kobuk Valley's animals, plants and vistas so that everyone can experience their splendor.           Lights, Camera, Action! Kobuk Valley National Park is full of sweeping vistas and dynamic scenery that can't always be adequately captured by photographs. Check out these NPS produced videos to see the Kobuk Valley in action and tag along for a peek at some of our Junior Ranger programs.      Blogs Blogs are a great way to stay up-to-date on what's happening in your national park.  Written by park rangers and researchers, our blogs share the latest research and activities going on in Kobuk Valley National Park.
